name: Frontline Heroes VR
description: An incident in an experiment on a hadron particle accelerator opens a portal to alternative realities, horrible creatures from different realities emerge throughout the solar system and must be destroyed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP! or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 3570 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or better Storage: 6400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 7700K Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 Storage: 6400 MB available space
